Body:
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternUniform(normalization=1.0, regions=[(0, 1, 0, 1)]
    )
image = np.array([[0.0, 1.0, 2.0, 3.0], [0.0, 1.0, 2.0, 3.0], [0.0, 1.0, 
    2.0, 3.0], [0.0, 1.0, 2.0, 3.0], [0.0, 1.0, 2.0, 3.0]])
frame = ci_frame.ChInj(frame_geometry=ci_frame.FrameGeometry.
    euclid_bottom_left(), ci_pattern=pattern)
frame.frame_geometry.serial_prescan = ci_frame.Region(region=(0, 4, 0, 1))
extracted_array = frame.parallel_serial_calibration_section(image)
assert (extracted_array == np.array([[1.0, 2.0, 3.0], [1.0, 2.0, 3.0], [1.0,
    2.0, 3.0], [1.0, 2.0, 3.0], [1.0, 2.0, 3.0]])).all()
